summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4730 for the improvement of the alley in block "B" Rowe's 1st Addition and BLock "D" Rowe's 2nd Addition, from Bellevue Avenue North to Olive Way, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54682, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
